title: Serpenta NFT Collection
description: 5555 Genesis Dragon NFT heroes enter the Void for the Dragon Army! What unique powers will you emerge with?

roadmapOne.title: WHAT IS SERPENTA NFT?
roadmapOne.body:
An NFT collection where your chosen Dragons battle through unknown worlds beyond the dimensional portal known as the Great Void! 5555 Genesis Dragons have been conscripted and have undergone harsh training before venturing into the mysterious Void.

 

Escape from your shackles and discover rare traits, outfits and artifacts that uniquely show off your personality and power! Serpenta is a fantastic Web3 journey and discovery experience combining NFT pixel art, anime and on-chain storytelling!

roadmapTwo.title: What's Coming
roadmapTwo.body:
Exceptionally detailed and desirable NFT Pixel Art avatars that accumulate levels and treasure with each Void mission. Find out who, or what is behind the Portal incursions and decide which clan factions you align with. Experience on-chain idle encounters and find ultra-rare drops through the exciting exploits of your Dragons!

 

Serpenta is working with anime artists to provide limited, rare art drops to holders, Tokyo streetwear partnerships, membership benefits on top of the planned AFK/Idle game, staking and many other community opportunities. Dragon holders will decide on the breeding of the next Dragon generation and unveil secrets that reveal your future Anime Waifu Navigators.

roadmapThree.title: The Serpenta Road Ahead
roadmapThree.body: We have some fantastic things planned for all our Serpenta community. Staking, hybrid and second generation breeding, new designs, evolving mechanics, non-pixel art, exclusive anime waifus (just because it'll be awesome), a possible Idle-AFK game and rare exclusive collaborations with Japanese artists and animators are just the tip of the iceberg! Read on for more

faq.answerOne: 5555 Genesis Dragons are vigorously training and will reveal themselves after the launch date. Get whitelisted early to be able to reserve and mint your dragons first. Public access will be granted to all once after the whitelisted members have reserved their dragon. Every wallet will be able to mint up to X dragons. Follow our twitter and discord for the latest news.
faq.answerTwo: Currently TBC. The initial sale price for a Serpenta Dragon will be REDACTED ETH, +some ETH for the gas fee.
faq.questionThree: How do I buy a Serpenta Dragon?
faq.answerThree: During the whitelist or public mint periods you can visit the Serpenta mint page from our homepage and obtain one of our limited unrevealed NFTs at launch. Once the initial launch phase has sold out on the website, you will be able to acquire a Dragon directly on OpenSea, the NFT marketplace. We recommend using the Metamask extension on Chrome for payment and a Crypto exchange for initial ETH funding.
faq.answerFour: There will be a total of 5555 Serpenta Genesis Dragons.
faq.answerFive: Ask us questions on Twitter or direct them to our community in our Discord. Everyone is super friendly!

stages.text: Surviving your first excursion in the Void as a newbie recruit is tough! Training with the Dragon Army Elites can prepare you for your first visit - but who knows what worlds you will find and what traits you will absorb as a result? [ Mint launch ]

Choose your own path - Rebel, or Imperial? The Army wants you to carry out their missions - Look deep within yourself and enhance your Dragon's strengths. What new treasures and journeys will you discover as you challenge the Void? [ Dragon Staking / Branding ]

The Five primary Dragon Clans scheme to expand their influence. Not all is as it seems - why is the High Council creating a new generation of hybrid Dragonlings and how will they change the balance of power? [ Dragonling Breeding ]

The Great Void investigations continue and stories and tales continue to be told. Chaos lurks within and only the strongest teams can work together to defeat the unexpected hordes that start to break out. Great artists ink and capture the personalities of your future companions. [ Rare Japanese Art, Banner & Story Drops ]

Every Dragon deserves a great companion to accompany them on their adventures! No one knows in which metaverse the Anime Waifu Navigators were discovered, but they're resourceful, smart and here to stay! [ Anime Navigator Waifus ]

A grand goal for our project is to be able to complete an Idle/AFK game with the whole history and storyline spread across numerous chapters. All the loose threads and mysteries of the world and Serpenta brand will be blended into a fantastic. [ Idle-AFK Game, XP & expansions ]

members.name: Pine
members.title: creative designer
members.description: Our creative lead, a prolific and successful collector of fine digital antiquities, a respected member in many communities and a determined proponent of the hard work behind the business grind and hustle.

members.name: Miaoux
members.title: marketing, biz-dev
members.description: Storyteller and geek polymath specialising in growth and logistics. Serial builder of multi-million dollar companies. He's channeling his seasoned expertise in business, NFTs and crypto to benefit Serpenta.

members.name: Remo
members.title: Designer
members.description: Bringing the dragons to vibrant life is our inspired indie artist. He joined our talented team many moons ago and astounds us with his skill daily. We are fortunate to have his visionary abilities.

members.name: Dani
members.title: solidity engineer
members.description: Our insanely skilled dev has contributed to a more efficient ERC721A and written many more ethereum contracts. He is in constant demand from developers for his solidity expertise. We are in safe hands.

members.name: Mr. Hmmm
members.title: advisor
members.description: Experienced, smart and the source of so much wisdom. Mr. Hmmm is one of the most genuine people you will meet in the space. He really cares about everyone he works with. Without him and his knowledge, we would not be where we are.

members.name: SGar
members.title: collab champion
members.description: An amazingly warm-hearted team member who naturally makes friends wherever he goes, in addition to being a great musician and creator. We're blessed to have such a well connected Champion for Serpenta who is at the top of his game.

members.name: Purple
members.title: front end developer
members.description: Everything you see here, he is responsible for. It is no understatement that his skills, ability and brains are why you are still reading! If you want a project to look this professional, you need exemplary, capable team members.

members.name: Archienne
members.title: Head Mod
members.description: While we do have a much larger team that we could go on about all day, the one central pin that holds everything together is Archienne! The community, the events, the order - we are grateful for his enthusiasm and organisation.
